unnormalised: Oh man, the wedding was supposed to be at "The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Sea Princess, Juhu, Mumbai, 400049" but due to some last-minute waterlogging issues near "Juhu Beach", they shifted it to "Taj Lands End, Bandstand, Bandra (W), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050". Talk about a nightmare for the families! I remember seeing "Mr. Sharma's" invitation with the original address, and then getting a text the day before with the new venue details at "Bandra West". Thankfully, I double-checked or else I would've ended up in the wrong part of town with my new saree! The new address also specified near "Mannat", SRK's house, easy landmark at least.
normalised: Oh man, the wedding was supposed to be at "The Grand Ballroom, Hotel Sea Princess, Juhu, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and forty nine" but due to some last-minute waterlogging issues near "Juhu Beach", they shifted it to "Taj Lands End, Bandstand, Bandra (W), Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand and fifty". Talk about a nightmare for the families! I remember seeing "Mister Sharma's" invitation with the original address, and then getting a text the day before with the new venue details at "Bandra West". Thankfully, I double-checked or else I would have ended up in the wrong part of town with my new saree! The new address also specified near "Mannat", S-R-K's house, easy landmark at least.
